sen.e: A portrait of Ichizan Ichinei, an envoy of the Emperor of Yuan dynasty China who came to Japan and served at Kencho-ji and Engaku-ji Temples in Kamakura before becoming the 3rd head priest of Nanzen-ji Temple, that is said to have been crafted soon after his death.
